job_history.work_description: Assisted in daily supervision and administration of facility and interacted with members to ensure programs were carried out in a safe and effective manner. Planned, organized and implemented recreation leagues and events throughout the calendar year. Supervised recreation programs, resolving any issues or disputes that may arise. Enforced safety and administered first aid to participants when required. Assisted supervisor in developing budget and developed innovative ways to increase revenue. Responsible for financial transactions including daily cash deposits and purchasing responsibilities including maintaining a purchasing card and receipt of sale.

Developed and implemented programs to assess and increase the health and physical activity levels of various populations. Managed HealthCalc software program through the enrollment of new clients and maintained private records. Conducted health and wellness assessments for clients and assisted them with goal setting and strategies to improve and maintain their health and worksite wellness.

Developed and utilized special programs to connect with various health and wellness populations. Maintained great rapport with all customers ensuring all needs were handled in a timely manner. Entered appropriate documents into software database ensuring each participant was safe for physical activity assessments and participation.

Supervised 40 staff at the university's 100,000 square foot facility and assisted in the new hire recruitment and training procedures. Provided exceptional customer service to all members and prepared daily reports recording any issues within the facility. Administrative support by assisting with budget preparation, financial reports, membership sales, payment records, account charges, collections and deposits.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has supervised staff of up to 40 people and managed various programs and events, showing strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Event Planning
skills.explanation: Planned, organized, and implemented recreation leagues and events throughout the calendar year, indicating strong proficiency in event planning.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Assisted in developing budgets and preparing financial reports, showing a solid working proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Handled financial transactions, including daily cash deposits and purchasing responsibilities, indicating a solid working proficiency in financial management.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided exceptional customer service to all members, showing strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed various programs and events, including recreation leagues and health and wellness programs, indicating a solid working proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Health and Wellness
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented programs to assess and increase the health and physical activity levels of various populations, showing strong proficiency in health and wellness.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Entered appropriate documents into software database, indicating some practical experience with data entry.

skills.name: Software Management
skills.explanation: Managed HealthCalc software program, indicating some practical experience with software management.
